title: Unable to login to the game
body:
WTH IS WRONG WITH RIOT?
does anyone else experience the same problem as me?
I've been waiting for days to log into the game but they still refuse it.
reconnecting the whole time,,,
plz... tell me something about this situation

replies.body: I solved the problem with using the non-admin launcher... Hope it helps
Give this man a cookie. I got in using this. Thanks :)
"LOGIN ERROR: Server is currently busy. Please try again later." Just started getting this error now, and i know full well that the server is not busy.
Yeah i can't log in either...
they all probably have a thanksgiving break and leave the nerds having pain in break tho.

> WTH IS WRONG WITH RIOT?
> does anyone else experience the same problem as me?
> I've been waiting for days to log into the game but they still refuse it.
> reconnecting the whole time,,,
> plz... tell me something about this situation

WOOHOO i finally got in. guys just spam your login! i got it like on the 6th try!
I am sorry but this is just bad.  I'm not going to spend time just trying to login to play a damn game when I can play DOTA with half the hassle.  Riot really needs to address these login issues...
